title: IP refunds and 1 more RP refund!
body:
Everybody makes mistakes on refunding IP bought items, and wasted a RP refund. What I thing should happen is that riot can make IP refunds like the Regular refunds.
1 riot points refund and the other one can be a RP refund so anyone can get IP back for a different refund.{{champion:202}} what do you think?

replies.body: i do not think we need more Rp refund post .. we have like 50 on the first page :)
Yea, but I mean, if u refunded a ip purchase and waste one, there's a ip refund instead of wasting one that includes both

I do not think Riot will ever add more Refunds now because of Hextech crafting .
